title: Brand value of Reebok 2012 to 2017
yAxis: Brand value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Brand value in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 6 data points.
In general Brand value in billion U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Brand value in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2014, and finally roughly constant from 2014 to 2017.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
The highest Brand value in billion U.S. dollars, of value 1.2 was reached at Year 2012
The lowest Brand value in billion U.S. dollars, of value 0.8 was reported at Year 2016, and 2017
